history.proof: intros fbar H xbar. unfold induced_function. unfold quotient_projection. destruct QArith_base.Qmake as [H1 H2]. apply BinIntDef.Z.rem. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: quotient_projection, quotient_projection_correct, constructive_definite_description, eq_sym, description_of_fbar, proj1_sig. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: quotient_projection, quotient_projection_correct, constructive_definite_description, eq_sym, description_of_fbar, proj1_sig. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: quotient_projection, quotient_projection_correct, constructive_definite_description, eq_sym, description_of_fbar, proj1_sig. - hauto q: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: remember (constructive_definite_description (fun y : B => exists x : A, proj1_sig (quotient_projection R x) = xbar /\ f x = y) (description_of_fbar xbar)) as y eqn:Heqy.

original: intros fbar H xbar. unfold induced_function. unfold quotient_projection. simpl. rewrite (quotient_projection_correct A R). remember (constructive_definite_description (fun y : B => exists x : A, proj1_sig (quotient_projection R x) = xbar /\ f x = y) (description_of_fbar xbar)) as y eqn:Heqy. symmetry in Heqy. destruct Heqy as [H1 H2]. rewrite H1. apply eq_sym. apply H2.
